pacmangameplay.gamelogic
Class DotCounterControl

java.lang.Object
  pacmangameplay.gamelogic.DotCounterControl

public class DotCounterControl
extends java.lang.Object

Controls all the dot counters in the game: 3 personal counters, Blinky's Elroy counter, the global counter, and the last dot timer.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

updateElroyCounter

public void updateElroyCounter()
Updates Blinky's Elroy Dot Counter. If it's enabled and one the limits is reached, Blinky turns into Elroy1 or Elroy2. If it's disabled it waits for Clyde to leave the pen before being enabled again.

updateLastDotTimer

public void updateLastDotTimer()
Updates the last dot timer. If the time limit is reached, the most preferred ghost in the pen leaves and the timer is restarted.

resetCounters

public void resetCounters()
Resets all 3 personal counters, Blinky's Elroy Counter and the global counter.

resetStatuses

public void resetStatuses()
Resets the statuses of all the dot counters.

updateDotCounters

public void updateDotCounters()
Updates all the counters when a dot is eaten. -The last dot timer is restarted -The personal and global counters are updated -The Elroy counter is incremented

resetLevel

public void resetLevel()
Updates counters when a life is lost. Disables all the ghosts' counters and activates and resets the global counter. Restats the last dot timer.

changeLevel

public void changeLevel()
Resets counters for a new level.

newGame

public void newGame()
Resets counters for a new game.
